name: Serpopard
description: The Serpopard is a large monstrosity with a unique appearance suited for ambushing prey. It has a sleek, muscular build with features adapted for stealth and speed.
memorable: The Serpopard excels in ambush tactics, utilizing camouflage and striking rapidly with its multiattack.
goals: To ambush and hunt prey in coastal and swampy environments.
relations: Often encountered in swamps or coastal regions; may share territory with other predators.
strengths: Exceptional stealth and ambush skills, high Dexterity, and strong melee attacks.
weaknesses: Poor Intelligence and Charisma limit strategic interactions and social engagement.
attacks: Multiattack combining one Bite and two Claw attacks, dealing substantial melee damage.
most_powerful_ability: Musk ability, releasing a noxious cloud that inflicts poison damage and crowd control.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive Perception score of 13, allowing it to detect creatures in low visibility.
skills: Notably proficient in Stealth, allowing it to remain undetected while hunting.
additional_information: Has advantage on Stealth checks when hiding in sandy, muddy, or swampy terrain.
Resistant to poison damage and immune to the poisoned condition.
Can deal damage to multiple foes with its Musk ability.
Strong Dexterity and Strength contribute to its effectiveness in battle.
Predator that thrives in ambush situations.
